title: Reset account password
token-invalid-description: The token is either invalid or expired. You can make another request to get a new token.
oauth-not-supported: Changing password for OAuth accounts is not supported.
password-reset-send-description: Check your email for instructions on resetting your password.
password-reset-send-failed: We couldn't send you an email. Please try again later.
password-reset-email-not-found: This email cannot be found on AskDev. You can sign up for a new account with this email.
